programme.title: The Sky at Night
programme.desc: The team explores the threat of an asteroid impact on earth and meet space scientists who are developing methods of planetary defence that sound like the stuff of science fiction. Maggie meets Professor Alan Fitzsimmons, expert in asteroid observation, to learn how the latest technology monitors near-Earth asteroids. He explains which ones are a current concern, and why we missed the dangerous Chelyabinsk meteor - a 9,000-ton fireball that exploded in the sky above Russia

programme.title: Railways: The Making of a Nation
programme.desc:
Capitalism and Commerce: Liz McIvor examines how the railways stimulated great changes to the nation's economy, and encouraged a new generation of mechanical engineers, skilled workers, managers and accountants. Originally, local entrepreneurs viewed trains as vehicles for shifting raw materials, stock and goods, however it soon became clear that there was money to be made in transporting people
S01E02

programme.title: A House Through Time
programme.desc:
David Olusoga traces the history of an 18th-century sea captain's house near Bristol's docks with links to the slave trade. Bristol was a major port in the transportation of slaves from Africa's Guinea Coast to the Caribbean, and both the man who built the house and its first full-time resident were heavily involved in the trade. David uncovers stories of piracy, abandoned babies, a household slave who made a daring escape from the property, and a protest on the doorstep as the abolitionist movement gained momentum
S03E01

programme.title: Tea with Mussolini (1999)
programme.desc: Eccentric English and American women living in Florence during the tense pre-war years of the 1930s experience the ups and downs of parenthood when they collectively adopt a local boy disowned by his father. However, as international hostilities break out, their happy existence comes under threat. Period comedy drama, starring Maggie Smith, Judi Dench, Joan Plowright, Cher, Lily Tomlin and Baird Wallace

programme.title: Summer Holiday (1963)
programme.desc: Four mechanics embark on a fun-filled trip across Europe on board a double-decker London bus, and enjoy all manner of romantic adventures with three young women who hitch a ride on their way to Athens. However, an unexpected stowaway causes a few surprises. Musical comedy, starring Cliff Richard, Lauri Peters, Melvyn Hayes, Una Stubbs, Ron Moody and the Shadows

programme.title: Mark Kermode's Secrets of Cinema
programme.desc:
Mark Kermode's Secrets of Cinema: Pop Music Movies: The critic examines techniques and conventions within a genre that mixes film and music and encompasses many forms, from drama and comedy to fantasy and documentary. There is the classic pop star vehicle, where the biggest acts play themselves, or a version of themselves, as well as dramatised accounts of the stars' lives that dazzle with musical set pieces, while playing on the fascination with the darker side of fame
S03E02

programme.title: Paul Merson: A Walk Through My Life
programme.desc: The football pundit and former Arsenal and England midfielder walks through North Yorkshire, reflecting on his life, career and faith. Carrying a 360-degree camera, he also describes his struggles with drink and gambling addiction

programme.title: A House Through Time
programme.desc:
David Olusoga traces the history of an 18th-century sea captain's house near Bristol's docks with links to the slave trade. Bristol was a major port in the transportation of slaves from Africa's Guinea Coast to the Caribbean, and both the man who built the house and its first full-time resident were heavily involved in the trade. David uncovers stories of piracy, abandoned babies, a household slave who made a daring escape from the property, and a protest on the doorstep as the abolitionist movement gained momentum
S03E01

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Glasgow 4/5: Ballet enthusiast and hospitality management student Erwin Orduz hosts the fourth dinner party in Glasgow and hopes to impress his guests with an evening of shocks and surprises. He attempts hotel-style presentation and serves up his meals in a dining room that has been decorated with a menagerie theme of animals and nakedness

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc:
North London: In north London, Helen and her Albanian boyfriend David kick off the contest with their Greek menu. Their food goes down well with Sara and her Aussie husband Thierry, which is more than can be said for David's views on women's roles within the home. On day two, Vicky and Geoff cook up an Italian menu, but their rock and pop idol dress code is a huge flop with one couple. The hosts face a grilling over food shortcuts, and Helen and Vicky go head to head in the battle of the cheesecakes. Finally, Sara and Thierry serve up the fashions and food of the 1980s. However, one guest makes a fashion faux pas about Sara's favourite frock
S2020E20

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2015: South Tenerife: Tony and Lisa Meredith have aspired to own a holiday home in South Tenerife for years, and are ready to pursue their dream now that their children have left home. Jasmine Harman helps them navigate the local property market and shows them an apartment with amazing views for almost Â£20,000 under their Â£100,000 budget

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2017: Florida: Young-at-heart couple Natalie and Andy Ray love Florida for its fun-filled attractions and weather, and are looking for a future family holiday home there. Ben Hillman tempts them with five homes within easy reach of the theme parks, all within their budget of Â£280,000

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc:
A Cornish couple want to leave Penzance to spend their retirement in Spain. On the Algarve, a former sailor and his wife are looking to buy their perfect Portuguese property
S05E16

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc:
The owners of a village in the Limousin region of France discover their roof needs repairing. A Manchester couple host a wedding reception in their hamlet
S01E08

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc:
Gemma turns an old TV cabinet into a luxury dog bed, while Henry trades in his lifelong love of mechanicals to upcycle wooden furniture
S06E03

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Derby 1/5: Wrestling promoter Dale Harvey hosts the first dinner party in Derby, where he hopes to impress aspiring thespian Beth Dunmore, business support manager Jo-Anna, mother-of-three Ondine Shardlow, and triathlete David Morris with a wrestling-themed extravaganza featuring large men in tight lycra. However, a fractious royal debate dampens the mood

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Derby 2/5: Business support manager Jo-Anna hosts the second dinner party in Derby, and hopes to wow her guests with a glitz and glam evening - complete with ball gowns and poetry. However, David is hoping for a more lively night - and his antics do not impress fellow contestant Dale

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Derby 3/5: PR whizz Beth Dunmore hosts the third night in Derby, and she hopes to impress her guests with her vaguely Middle Eastern menu. However, she has her work cut out when it comes to the fussy David Morris, whose confidence seems to be growing as the week progresses. Beth has a fan in cruise ship connoisseur Jo-Anna, though, while single mum Ondine Shardlow is disappointed with the level of competition and thinks she has the week in the bag

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Derby 4/5: Ondine Shardlow hosts the fourth dinner party in Derby, hoping to impress her guests with a flavoursome Greek holiday-inspired menu. However, her carefully planned evening takes a turn for the worse when she manages to insult Dale, and Jo-Anna displays some questionable table manners

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Derby 5/5: It is the final day of the dinner party contest in Derby and the turn of triathlete David Morris to serve his offerings. Ondine is not impressed by his small portions, big flavours approach, and is even less satisfied with Jo-Anna's behaviour during the week. The host throws an impromptu work-out class where wrestling promoter Dale Harvey is put through his paces, before the winner of the Â£1,000 prize is announced

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2023: Poitou-Charentes: Sara Damergi heads to Poitou-Charentes in the west of France to help house-hunters Jules and Gaynor, who are planning a permanent move to rural France to run their own gite

programme.title: Grand Designs
programme.desc:
Stowmarket, 2010: Kevin McCloud follows the progress of Simon and Jill Bennett as they try to restore two timber-framed barns in Suffolk. The couple found out that one of the buildings is among the smallest surviving medieval guildhalls in the country, and while Kevin advises them to conserve it in its present state, Simon is determined to restore it to its former glory
S10E04

programme.title: Location, Location, Location
programme.desc:
Kirstie and Phil help househunters in Edinburgh. Phil meets Freya and Elliot who are moving from Aberdeen to the capital for the cultural buzz. Kirstie helps Edinburgh lass Sadia and Irishman Sohail find their first family home so they can finally move out of Sadia's starter flat
S39E02

programme.title: The Equalizer (2014)
programme.desc: A retired secret agent applies his talents to the task of helping victims of injustice. When he witnesses a prostitute being beaten up by a pimp, he kills the man, an act that draws him into a battle to the death with a Russian crime syndicate. Action thriller based on the 1980s TV series, starring Denzel Washington and Chloe Grace Moretz

programme.title: Taskmaster
programme.desc:
SchrÃ¶dinger's Egg: Contenders Frankie Boyle, Ivo Graham, Jenny Eclair, Kiell Smith-Bynoe and Mae Martin continue to address the challenges set for them. As the battle for the trophy continues, Greg Davies and Alex Horne take things up a notch by introducing a pulper to proceedings. Jelly babies also cause friction between the participants
S15E07

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc:
The armchair critics share their opinions on what they have been watching during the week, with cameras capturing their instant reactions and the lively discussions that are prompted by the week's biggest and best shows
S21E11

programme.title: Gogglebox
programme.desc:
The armchair critics share their opinions on programmes including Dynasties II, Pieces of Her, Celebrity Mastermind, Joanna Lumley's Great Cities of the World, Is It Cake?, TOTP: 1992 Biggest Hits and Hospital: Road to Recovery. Plus, Good Morning Britain's reports on the P&O dispute and BBC News coverage of President Putin's rally
S19E06

programme.title: Naked Attraction
programme.desc:
Anna Richardson is joined by 25 year-old Lauren, a movie buff and professional online gamer from Camberley who is looking for a geeky gamer to be her perfect player two so she can reboot her love life after three years of being single. Ryan who is 28 and from Cheltenham, is looking for his Mr Right. As a sucker for a silver fox and a dad bod, can he find his dream guy to wake up to every morning?
S11E04

programme.title: 8 Out of 10 Cats Does Countdown
programme.desc:
Jon Richardson and Lucy Beaumont take on Roisin Conaty and Joe Wilkinson in the comedy words-and-numbers game, while Bec Hill joins Susie Dent in Dictionary Corner. Hosted by Jimmy Carr, with Rachel Riley looking after the numbers and letters
S21E05

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Glasgow 5/5: Yvonne Finlayson hosts the final night of the cooking competition in Glasgow, offering her guests a combination of 'scientifically-infused' food, high-octane entertainment and scintillating chat - plus a healthy dose of revelations - to try to claim the Â£1,000 prize

programme.title: Couples Come Dine with Me
programme.desc:
Three couples in north London compete to host the best dinner party. First to host are husband and wife Elorm and Mimi, who are confident their Afro-fusion menu and some Afro-beats will see them triumph. Night two sees Kiri and Dale host a soiree that includes an introduction to the host's love of taxidermy. On the final night, hosts Serge and Eleni treat their guests to a menu originating from their Greek-Cypriot heritage. Their twist is a somewhat unique 'Kebab Olympics' in the back garden
S2020E07

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2015: Denia, Costa Blanca: Reg and Aby Solomon from Hertfordshire look to buy a family holiday home near the Spanish town of Denia on the popular Costa Blanca. Laura Hamilton searches every nook and cranny of the local market in an attempt to find properties that match the couple's Â£200,000 budget, but it remains to be seen whether she can deliver the perfect place in the perfect location

programme.title: A Place in the Sun
programme.desc: 2017: Barbados: Hyacinth Miller from London first visited Barbados 14 years ago, and now that she's retired, wants to permanently relocate there and spend time in the garden. With her son Leon along to help choose the right property, Jasmine Harman shows Hyacinth five properties in the south of the island, but do any of them have her packing her bags for a new life in the sun?

programme.title: Sun, Sea and Selling Houses
programme.desc:
In Alicante, early retirees Sarah and Mark search for a home in the sun on a budget on 120,000 euros, while the Rodriguez family throw a housewarming party with a difference
S05E17

programme.title: Help! We Bought a Village
programme.desc:
The owners of a village in France host the local council at their restaurant, while a couple from Norwich spend their first Christmas in their hamlet. Meanwhile, in Spain, the very first guests arrive at a cave village in AndalucÃ­a
S01E09

programme.title: Find It, Fix It, Flog It
programme.desc:
Henry Cole and Simon O'Brien visit Oxford to meet Rosemary, whose father owned a second-hand goods shop. They discover a servant's call bell and a mysterious pedal-powered tool, which Simon is anxious to restore
S06E04

programme.title: Come Dine with Me
programme.desc: Manchester 1/5: The competition heads to Manchester, where battling it out for the Â£1,000 cash prize are part-time DJ Dom, 35-year old barber Danny, trainee barrister Sasha, nurse Katherine and goth Maria. programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: Come Dine with Me

programme.title: First Snow (2006)
programme.desc: A salesman stranded in a remote New Mexico town is told by a psychic that he will die the next day that it snows. As the weather grows colder, he becomes obsessed with revisiting his past as he strives to find a way to change his destiny before it is too late. Thriller, starring Guy Pearce, Piper Perabo, William Fichtner and JK Simmons

programme.title: Trumbo (2015)
programme.desc: Biopic of the acclaimed Hollywood screenwriter Dalton Trumbo, who was jailed and blacklisted in the 1940s for his left-wing political views. On his release from prison, he manages to continue writing using a series of pseudonyms, and his newfound success leads many to question the validity of the blacklist. Biopic of the writer, starring Bryan Cranston, Diane Lane and Helen Mirren

programme.title: Splice (2009)
programme.desc: Two scientists hope to create new creatures for medical purposes by combining DNA from various animals. When their funding is stopped, they secretly create a new creature incorporating human DNA. However, they soon realise they cannot control it, while the relationship between the being and its creators turns dangerous. Sci-fi horror, starring Adrien Brody, Sarah Polley and Delphine Chaneac
A man's life is derailed when a disturbing pattern of events repeats itself in the same manner every day, ending at 2.22 pm. Thriller, starring Michiel Huisman, Teresa Palmer and Maeve Dermody

programme.title: Nightcrawler (2014)
programme.desc: A cynical petty crook is inspired when he sees a freelance camera crew, and decides to go into business filming crime scenes and accidents, then selling the footage to news broadcasters. His determination to stay ahead of the competition leads him down a dark path as his methods become increasingly ruthless. Crime drama, starring Jake Gyllenhaal, Rene Russo and Bill Paxton
